heading: Password Encryption
body: Used encryption, salt, and hashing techniques using a master password to store password, which could only be read with the master password.

heading: Template
body: A template to allow for a quick start solution that requires a Next.js frontend and a .Net backend using Auth0 as the authorisation provider. Actively being maintained.
